title: American-Born JPL Scientist Forced to Unlock a NASA Phone by U.S. Customs and Border Protection?
subtitle: American-born JPL scientist Sidd Bikkannavar asserted CBP seized his phone and demanded access to its stored data.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: CBP seized the phone of American-born JPL scientist Sidd Bikkannavar and demanded access to its stored data.
